title: introduction to context engineering in llm models

overview.description: This course provides a foundational understanding of context engineering within large language models (LLMs), focusing specifically on the Gemini context windows. As LLMs become increasingly integral to various applications, understanding how to effectively manage and utilize context is crucial for optimizing their performance. Participants will explore the concept of context windows, how they influence model outputs, and the strategies for effectively engineering context to enhance the relevance and accuracy of generated responses. Through a combination of theoretical insights and practical examples, learners will gain a comprehensive overview of the principles and practices of context engineering in LLMs.
overview.target_audience: This course is intended for individuals who are new to the field of artificial intelligence and large language models. It is suitable for students, professionals, and enthusiasts who wish to understand the fundamental concepts of context engineering in LLMs. No prior experience in programming or machine learning is required, making it an ideal starting point for anyone interested in exploring the capabilities of LLMs and their applications in various domains.
prerequisites: Basic understanding of artificial intelligence concepts.
Familiarity with general programming principles is helpful but not required.

modules.title: Understanding Context in LLMs
modules.description: This module introduces the concept of context in large language models, focusing on its importance and implications for model performance.
module_outcomes: Define context and its significance in LLMs.
Explain how context windows affect model outputs.
Identify different types of context windows.

lessons.title: What is Context in LLMs?
lessons.summary: Explore the definition and significance of context in large language models.

hands_on_labs.title: Lab on Context Definition
hands_on_labs.goal: Students will define context and its importance in a practical scenario.

micro_exercises.title: Identify Context
micro_exercises.task: Provide examples of context in everyday language.

micro_exercises.title: Context vs. Content
micro_exercises.task: Differentiate between context and content in LLM outputs.

knowledge_check.question: What is context in LLMs?
knowledge_check.answer: Context refers to the surrounding information that influences the model's output.

knowledge_check.question: Why is context important?
knowledge_check.answer: Context is crucial for generating relevant and coherent responses.

objectives: Define context in the realm of LLMs.
Discuss the role of context in generating responses.
real_world_use_cases: Using context to improve chatbot responses.
common_mistakes: Assuming context is irrelevant to model outputs.

lessons.title: Context Windows Explained
lessons.summary: Learn about context windows and their role in LLM performance.

hands_on_labs.title: Lab on Context Windows
hands_on_labs.goal: Students will analyze different context window configurations.

micro_exercises.title: Identify Context Window Types
micro_exercises.task: List examples of fixed and dynamic context windows.

micro_exercises.title: Impact of Context Window Size
micro_exercises.task: Discuss how changing the size of context windows affects outputs.

knowledge_check.question: What is a context window?
knowledge_check.answer: A context window is the amount of text the model considers when generating a response.

knowledge_check.question: What are the types of context windows?
knowledge_check.answer: The main types are fixed and dynamic context windows.

objectives: Identify different types of context windows.
Discuss the implications of context window size.
real_world_use_cases: Adjusting context windows for improved text generation.
common_mistakes: Confusing context windows with model parameters.

lessons.title: Manipulating Context for Better Outputs
lessons.summary: Learn strategies for effectively manipulating context to enhance model outputs.

hands_on_labs.title: Lab on Context Manipulation
hands_on_labs.goal: Students will practice manipulating context to improve model responses.

micro_exercises.title: Context Addition Exercise
micro_exercises.task: Add relevant context to a given prompt and analyze the output.

micro_exercises.title: Context Removal Exercise
micro_exercises.task: Remove irrelevant context from a prompt and observe changes in output.

knowledge_check.question: How can context be manipulated?
knowledge_check.answer: Context can be manipulated by adding or removing information that influences the model's response.

knowledge_check.question: What is the effect of irrelevant context?
knowledge_check.answer: Irrelevant context can lead to confusing or inaccurate outputs.

objectives: Analyze the impact of context manipulation on outputs.
Apply context manipulation techniques in practical scenarios.
real_world_use_cases: Improving response relevance in customer service bots.

modules.title: Advanced Context Engineering Techniques
modules.description: This module covers advanced techniques for context engineering, including case studies and practical applications.
module_outcomes: Analyze case studies of effective context engineering.
Evaluate the impact of context on model performance.

lessons.title: Case Studies in Context Engineering
lessons.summary: Examine real-world case studies that illustrate effective context engineering strategies.

hands_on_labs.title: Lab on Case Study Analysis
hands_on_labs.goal: Students will analyze a case study and present findings.

micro_exercises.title: Identify Key Strategies
micro_exercises.task: List key strategies used in a given case study.

micro_exercises.title: Outcome Analysis
micro_exercises.task: Discuss the outcomes of the case study and their implications.

knowledge_check.question: What is a case study in context engineering?
knowledge_check.answer: A case study is an in-depth analysis of a specific instance of context engineering.

knowledge_check.question: Why are case studies important?
knowledge_check.answer: They provide insights into successful strategies and outcomes.

objectives: Analyze the strategies used in these cases.
Discuss the outcomes of effective context engineering.
real_world_use_cases: Successful implementation of context in AI-driven applications.
common_mistakes: Neglecting to analyze the outcomes of context engineering.

lessons.title: Evaluating Context Impact on Outputs
lessons.summary: Learn how to evaluate the impact of context on the relevance and accuracy of model outputs.

hands_on_labs.title: Lab on Context Evaluation
hands_on_labs.goal: Students will evaluate context impact on model outputs.

micro_exercises.title: Quantitative Evaluation Exercise
micro_exercises.task: Perform a quantitative analysis of context impact.

micro_exercises.title: Qualitative Evaluation Exercise
micro_exercises.task: Conduct a qualitative assessment of context relevance.

knowledge_check.question: What methods can be used to evaluate context impact?
knowledge_check.answer: Both quantitative and qualitative methods can be used.

knowledge_check.question: Why is it important to evaluate context?
knowledge_check.answer: Evaluating context helps ensure the relevance and accuracy of outputs.

objectives: Discuss methods for evaluating context impact.
Analyze the relationship between context and output quality.
Apply evaluation techniques in practical scenarios.
real_world_use_cases: Assessing the effectiveness of context in customer interactions.
common_mistakes: Failing to measure the impact of context changes.

lessons.title: Advanced Manipulation Techniques
lessons.summary: Explore advanced techniques for manipulating context to optimize model performance.

hands_on_labs.title: Lab on Advanced Techniques
hands_on_labs.goal: Students will practice advanced context manipulation techniques.

micro_exercises.title: Context Layering Exercise
micro_exercises.task: Implement context layering in a given scenario.

micro_exercises.title: Context Prioritization Exercise
micro_exercises.task: Prioritize context elements to optimize output.

knowledge_check.question: What is context layering?
knowledge_check.answer: Context layering involves stacking multiple context elements to enhance relevance.

knowledge_check.question: How does context prioritization work?
knowledge_check.answer: Context prioritization focuses on the most relevant elements for output generation.

objectives: Analyze the effectiveness of these techniques.
Apply advanced techniques in practical scenarios.
real_world_use_cases: Optimizing AI responses in complex scenarios.

capstone.title: Capstone Project on Context Engineering
capstone.description: Develop a comprehensive context engineering strategy for a specific application of LLMs.
deliverables: A detailed report on context strategies.
A presentation of findings and recommendations.
